original_text: Abraham was about 100 years old. His body was already so old that it was nearly dead. His wife, Sarah, was unable to have children. Abraham understood all that, but he did not stop trusting God. Abraham was about 100 years old. His body was already so old that it was nearly dead. His wife, Sarah, was unable to have children. Abraham understood all that, but he did not stop trusting God.
korean_text: 그가 백 세나 되어 자기 몸이 죽은 것 같고 사라의 태가 죽은 것 같음을 알고도 믿음이 약하여지지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: His body was already so old
His wife, Sarah, was unable to have children.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아내 사라는 아이를 낳을 수 없었습니다.

sentences.original_text: but he did not stop trusting God.
